overview: Things are about to get hot...Africa hot. Hard As Diamonds takes a sensual journey to South Africa, a land of sun, surf, sand and sex. Acclaimed director Frank Thring specializes in world travel and raunchy hardcore. Hard As Diamonds dishes up huge helpings of both. When an innocent couple vacationing in South Africa accidentally stumbles upon a briefcase full of stolen diamonds, they find themselves in a world of danger, intrigue and, of course, relentless hardcore action. This full-length feature film will take you places you've never been before and show you things that, well, would probably get you arrested. Hard As Diamonds is a XXX trip you don't want to miss!
title: Hard as Diamonds
